attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to stop benefits to people who are capable of working,and allow benefits for the people who actually need them.I would also like to stop immigrants coming into the country without a job to come to and to stop child benefits to be sent to other children in different countries,following this the NHS shouldnt be provided for immigrants unless they have a UK visa or UK passport

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Eldorado/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/nocashnoentry/

Titles of petitions should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
